page.title: 17SHOPS
page.content: There are five places in town where you can go and get something to eat. Three of these you can buy food to take away.There are 7 hairdressers. Two are barbers and the rest are unisex.There are some supermarkets and chemists.The main shops are in the high street or the town centre. There is a market every Saturday. During the week the market place is used as a car park. There are several large supermarkets in Huntingdon but bulk shoppers tend to travel to either the hypermarket at Bar Hill or to Peterborough and the Queensgate centre.
